instruction: Classify the following animals as carnivores, herbivores or omnivores - cheetah, deer and bear.

Deer are herbivores and often feed on leaves, twigs, fruits and nuts depending on their species. Finally bears are opportunistic eaters who will consume almost anything they come across including fish, insects or berries.

instruction: Generate three different ways to make a DIY face mask at home.
output: You can make DIY face masks at home using cotton fabric cloth available at hobby stores or cut out bandanas or old t-shirts using regular scissors. These materials can be used in combination with elastic bands, hair ties, or even shoelaces. One method involves folding a rectangular piece of cloth into thirds and sewing two sides together, leaving enough space for the nose and mouth to breathe. Another simple technique is to tie two loops on either end of a square cloth and place it over the face while tying the loops behind the head. Finally, you can create a pleated mask by folding an accordion-like pattern on a rectangular piece of cloth before securing it with elastic bands or hair ties on either side.

instruction: Generate a one-paragraph summary of the movie "The Godfather".
output: The Godfather is a widely acclaimed crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola, released in 1972. Set during the early 1940s and late 1950s, it revolves around the Corleone family - a powerful Mafia dynasty based in New York City. The film follows patriarch Vito Corleone (Marlon Brando), head of the family as he builds his criminal empire with help from his sons Michael (Al Pacino) and Fredo (John Cazale). With themes that explore morality and loyalty, The Godfather tells a story of power struggles within organized crime while portraying an intimate look at familial relationships amongst these dangerous characters. At its heart, the film is about how people navigate between their personal desires and moral obligations while meeting expectations of tradition and heritage within society's confines of lawful behavior..

instruction: Generate a one-paragraph summary of the novel "Animal Farm".
output: Animal Farm is a political allegory written by George Orwell, published in 1945. Set on an English farm, the story initially follows the livestock as they overthrow their human owner and assume control over their own destiny under pigs' charismatic leadership . At first it appears to be successful "animal socialism" but as time goes on , power becomes exploitative leading to consequences like corruption,murder and overall oppression of other animals who aren't part of ruling class. The novel elucidates how absolute power corrupts absolutely, through observing how principles are deliberately silenced or violated for furtherance of personal interests. With belief in equality failing each time someone comes into power regardless whether individuals were at base humans or animals .. The novel serves as warning against potential dangers posed by unchecked authoritarianism which can resurface anytime in any society.

instruction: Identify the largest continent in the world.

instruction: Describe the structure of an atom.
output: Atoms are the basic building blocks of matter and consist of three main types of subatomic particles: protons, neutrons, and electrons. Protons and neutrons make up the nucleus or center of an atom while electrons revolve around it in specific energy levels called shells or orbits. Protons are positively charged particles found in the nucleus that determine the atomic number and identity of the element.
